name: MyTestify
overview:
MyTestify.com is a lawsuit incubator. It allows people to get satisfaction via judicial system. Satisfaction could be monetary if people participate for example in a class action lawsuit or it could be emotional if they volunteer to provide fact witness testimony services to help someone win a lawsuit. People make incident summaries of situations that they feel maybe of interest to legal community in present or in future. These incident summaries are shared with lawyers who use it to find cooperative fact witnesses, organize class action lawsuits, find potential clients, etc. MyTestify makes money by charging lawyers a subscription fee for using our witness database and search tools.

Current legal discovery methods are limited by what records could be discovered and employee rotation; they do not cover accidental witnesses who just happened to be in the right place and time to know of critical piece of information. Witnesses forget details of what happened as time goes by. Current legal discovery methods are expensive and inefficient.

The global legal services market is forecast to generate nearly $650 billion by 2015 according to firstresearch.com. MyTestify will consolidate world’s witness population in one giant database which legal community could use as support in litigation.

MyTestify offers comprehensive worldwide database of cooperative witnesses whose legal testimony could be deciding factor in a lawsuit. Attorneys use key word search to find appropriate witness users. By setting specific search criteria attorneys can organize witnesses in victim groups (witnesses don’t need to know each other). Incident summaries serve as a time capsule that allows witnesses to retain factual information about their incidents for a very long time.

Legal discovery agencies that use conventional discovery methods to find witnesses that maybe used during litigation.
